bill_title: prohibit use of state dollars for certain deficits at South Dakota State University.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to prohibit use of state dollars for certain deficits at South Dakota State University. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. No state general fund dollars may be appropriated, nor may the Board of Regents use general fund dollars otherwise appropriated to the board or other state supported universities or the special schools, for the purpose of subsidizing South Dakota State University for any deficits that arise from the decision to become sanctioned as a division I university by the National Collegiate Athletic Association. 350 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.027 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.
